mapper.select: SELECT P.`no` AS 'product_no', PI.`no` AS 'image_no', P.*, PI.* FROM `product` P INNER JOIN `product_img` PI ON `P`.`no` = PI.`product_no` WHERE P.`no` = #{no}

WITH RECURSIVE `category_cte` AS ( SELECT `no`, `name` FROM `category` WHERE `no` = #{categoryNo} UNION ALL SELECT C.`no`, C.`name` FROM `category` C INNER JOIN `category_cte` CT ON C.`parent` = CT.`no` )SELECT CT.`no` AS 'category_no', CT.`name` AS 'category_name', P.`no` AS 'product_no', P.`name` AS 'product_name', PI.`no` AS 'image_no', P.*, PI.* FROM `category_cte` CT INNER JOIN `product` P ON P.`category_no` = CT.`no` INNER JOIN `product_img` PI ON `P`.`no` = PI.`product_no` ORDER BY `P`.`no`

SELECT C1.`no` c1_no, C1.`name` c1_name, C2.`no` c2_no, C2.`name` c2_name, C3.`no` c3_no, C3.`name` c3_name FROM `category` C1 INNER JOIN `category` C2 ON C1.`no` = C2.`parent` INNER JOIN `category` C3 ON C2.`no` = C3.`parent` ORDER BY C1.`no`, C2.`no`, C3.`no`

SELECT C1.`no` c1_no, C1.`name` c1_name, C2.`no` c2_no, C2.`name` c2_name, C3.`no` c3_no, C3.`name` c3_name FROM `category` C1 INNER JOIN `category` C2 ON C1.`no` = C2.`parent` INNER JOIN `category` C3 ON C2.`no` = C3.`parent` WHERE C2.`no` = ( SELECT DISTINCT CC1.`no` FROM `category` CC1 INNER JOIN `category` CC2 ON CC1.`no` = CC2.`parent` WHERE CC1.`no` = #{categoryNo} OR CC2.`no` = #{categoryNo} AND CC1.`parent` IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY C1.`no`, C2.`no`, C3.`no`
